note.p: Birth: Red Cross Street, London, England (c 1637)
Death: Three-leg Alley, St Bride's, London (08 December 1688)
Burial: St Bride's parish church, London
Education: Winchester College; Inner Temple (admitted 1654); New College, Oxford (matriculated 1655); St Catharine's College, Cambridge; MA (Lit. Reg. 1667)
Career: Fellow of New College (1656); called to the Bar (1662); Poet and miniature painter
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Foster; Hunter
